derivation: neuter of a compound of G5259 (ὑποζύγιον) and G2218 (ὑποζύγιον);
strongs_def: an animal under the yoke (draught-beast), i.e. (specially), a donkey
outline:
1. under the yoke
  2. a beast of burden, an ass
    1. the ass was the common animal used by the Orientals on journey and for carrying burdens
